title: How to Make a Mason Jar Soap Dispenser

steps.headline: Find an old liquid soap container.
Disassemble the soap container and set aside the pump.
Get your mason jar and remove the lid.
steps.description: Create a hole with a diameter in the center as same as the size of the pump's base.

steps.headline: Insert the pump components through the hole.
Test the fit of the lid on the jar.
Decorate as desired.
steps.description: You can use string, stickers, and scrapbook materials to decorate the outside, if you'd like.

steps.headline: Pour liquid soap to the mason jar.
Seal it and it's ready to use!

text: Find an old liquid soap container.  Disassemble the soap container and set aside the pump.  Take apart the pump.  Get your mason jar and remove the lid. Create a hole with a diameter in the center as same as the size of the pump's base. Insert the pump components through the hole.  Assemble the pump.  Test the fit of the lid on the jar.  Decorate as desired. You can use string, stickers, and scrapbook materials to decorate the outside, if you'd like. Pour liquid soap to the mason jar.  Seal it and it's ready to use!
